Package org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.util

Interface Summary
Array1D A 1-dimensional array of primitive double values, whose primary use is as a row in an Array2D array.
Array2D A 2-dimensional array that can contain a variable number of column elements for a given row.
ArrayFunction A function to be applied to an array of primitive double values within a Array1D object.
DateFormatter Interface used to switch between GWT and JDK date formatter implementations
PortableTimer Abstraction for running scheduled tasks, independent of JRE environment
PortableTimerTask Interface used by tasks that want to be scheduled by a PortableTimer
 

Class Summary
ArgChecker Conglomeration of static convenience methods that validate input arguments and throw a nicely-formatted IllegalArgumentException for illegal arguments.
DateParser Utility for parsing extended date formats
ExtremaArrayFunction Calculates the minimum and maximum values across all elements in an Array1D object.
Interval A mathematical interval representing a connected portion of a real line.
JavaArray2D Implementation of Array2D backed by a Java 2-dimensional array, and is growable.
MathUtil Conglomeration of common math functions.
MinIntervalArrayFunction Calculates the smallest interval in an Array1D object.
StopWatch Utility for measuring and outputting elapsed times.
StopWatch.TimeInterval Represents a span of time.
Util Conglomeration of common utility functions.
 

Enum Summary
TimeUnit Enumeration over common time units.
